::Axis/Lokk/Seekker::
Lokk once again throws his targeting lazer on Banzai-Tron.  The rocket
shot at Axis flies by and the one at Seekker is easily stepped around.
Axis fires two more missiles at Banzia-tron.  Seekker continues to
move around behind  him firing his Mini-guns.

The Chivtron sheilds take the 2 missiles and the shields pulse blue.
Teh indicator falls even lower into the yellow and almost into the orange.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Alloran2@a... wrote:
> OOC: OOPS! I put Hurricane and Wheeljack in by accident! It should
just be
> Sharpedge and Banzai-Tron. Sorry!
>
> :::Sharpedge/Banzai-Tron:::
>
> ::Sharpedge dodges the rockets, but gets hit by some mini-gun shots.
 he
> fires 1 missle at Axis, and 1 at Seekker::
> ~~~~~
> ::Banzai-Tron fires antoher 2 missles at the Chivtron base::
